event_datetime.description: Date and time of the event in yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss format

event_name.description: Name of the event (as passed to the SDK)

event_receive_datetime.description: Date and time when the install event was received on the server side. May differ from event_datetime due to network delays or if the user's device was not connected at the time of the event

event_receive_timestamp.description: Time when the event was received on the server side, in Unix timestamp format. May differ fromevent_timestamp due to network delays or if the user's device was not connected at the time of the event

event_timestamp.description: Time of the event in UNIX-time format

appmetrica_device_id.description: A unique device identifier detected by the AppMetrica service

city.description: The name in English of the city where the click took place (based on device's IP address)

connection_type.description: Device connection type. Possible values: wifi | cell | unknown

device_ipv6.description: The IP address at the time of event, in IPv6 format. For example, 2a02:6b8::40c:6676:baff:fea6:53d8, ::ffff:5.255.232.147

device_manufacturer.description: The device manufacturer as detected by the AppMetrica service (for example, Apple or Samsung)

device_model.description: The device model as detected by the AppMetrica service (for example, Galaxy S6)

device_type.description: The device type detected by the AppMetrica service. Possible values: phone | tablet | unknown

google_aid.description: Google AID device in the format received from the device

ios_ifa.description: IFA of the device in the format received from the device

ios_ifv.description: IFV for the app in the format received from the device

original_device_model.description: Factory model of the device (for example, the following values are possible for Galaxy S8: SM-G9550, SM-G9558, and so on)

os_name.description: Operating system on the user's device: ios | android | windows

os_version.description: Version of the operating system on the user's device

windows_aid.description: Windows AID of the device in the format received from the device

app_package_name.description: Package name for Android or Bundle ID for iOS (for example, ru.yandex.metro)

app_version_name.description: Version of the app as specified by the developer

application_id.description: Unique numeric identifier for the application in AppMetrica
